backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing authentication, user profiles, label configs, printers, print history, error logs, and authorization helpers with password‑based session tracking.
backend/migration.mo: No-op migration module that maps old actor state to the new structure without transforming label or user data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, related files, components, and test references for layout and label configuration improvements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files including pages, hooks, utilities, and contexts.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide with prerequisites, production setup steps, and canister management instructions.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining theme variables, light/dark modes, and base styling overrides.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell loading the React application through main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component handling authentication, navigation tabs, wake lock status, and page rendering within printer-related providers.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: React login UI handling authentication, backend health polling, error states, and auto-retry logic.
frontend/src/contexts/PrintProtocolConte: Context provider storing the active print protocol (CPCL, ZPL, ESC/POS) with a setter.
Context managing WebUSB printer connection, device info, errors, and sending CPCL commands.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth client lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for authentication, health checks, printers, label configs, user profiles, and related mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Hook managing screen wake lock activation, release, support detection, and visibility-based reacquisition.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables, and touch-optimized styles with tablet-specific tab sizing.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Devices.tsx: Manages USB printer connections, protocol selection, and test printing with backend status updates.
frontend/src/pages/Diagnostics.tsx: Displays print history and error counts and supports exporting diagnostics data as CSV.
frontend/src/pages/LabelSettings.tsx: Provides UI for configuring label layout, prefixes, titles, and preview rendering with saved settings.
frontend/src/pages/ScanPrint.tsx: Handles scanning, validation, and printing of serial numbers with USB printer support and error logging.
frontend/src/types/webusb.d.ts: Declares TypeScript types for the WebUSB API including devices, interfaces, endpoints, and transfer results.
frontend/src/utils/cpclTemplates.ts: Utilities for generating CPCL print jobs, including test labels and dual-serial layouts, plus helpers for estimating barcode widths and centering text.
frontend/src/utils/icErrors.ts: Functions for detecting IC-related errors, classifying network/auth/config issues, and producing user-friendly error messages.
frontend/src/utils/labelLayoutModel.ts: Unified layout model for label previews and CPCL printing, including dimension constants, centering helpers, and dual-serial layout computation.
Canvas renderer that draws dual‑serial label previews using Code128 rendering and the unified layout model.
frontend/src/utils/scannerOnlyInput.ts: Utility for distinguishing barcode scanner input from manual typing using timing heuristics and normalization.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color palette, extended animations, and typography/container-queries/animate plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing project state, including app summary, architecture notes for a React+IC system, and a list of known issues with backend auth and state handling.
